concept.title: Data protection
concept.shortdesc: NetApp Element software enables you to protect your data in a variety of ways with capabilities such as snapshots for individual volumes or groups of volumes, replication between clusters and volumes running on Element, and replication to ONTAP systems.

dd.p: Snapshot-only data protection replicates changed data at specific points of time to a remote cluster. Only those snapshots that are created on the source cluster are replicated. Active writes from the source volume are not.

dlentry.dt: Replication between clusters and volumes running on Element

dd.p: You can replicate volume data synchronously or asynchronously from either cluster in a cluster pair both running on running on Element for failover and failback scenarios.

dlentry.dt: Replication between Element and ONTAP clusters using SnapMirror technology

dd.p: With NetApp SnapMirror technology, you can replicate snapshots that were taken using Element to ONTAP for disaster recovery purposes. In a SnapMirror relationship, Element is one endpoint and ONTAP is the other.
